name: TwoDotFiveD
body:
### About
Capstone project for Christopher Newport University, Spring 2012. Utilizes JBullet and LWJGL to render a 3D physics environment. Allows for multiple clients to server to network events occuring in the worlds.

You will need Maven in order to get all the project library dependencies automatically.

### Authors and Contributors
* Andrew Tucker - (@andrewTucker)
* Bridget Corcoran - (@Krigen)
* Clifford Mahair - (@cmahair)
* Justin Waddell - (@jwaddell)
* [Vincent Deloso] - (@Mitsugaru)

[Vincent Deloso]: https://twitter.com/#!/tokume
tagline: 3D Java-based networked physics game as a Senior Capstone project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
